name: Space Marauder
description:
Space Marauder (known as Burai Senshi Color in Japan) is a horizontal scrolling shooter developed and published by KID in Japan and Agetec in North America for the Game Boy Color. It was released in Japan on July 23, 1999, and in North America on August 28, 2000.

It is like Burai Fighter on the Nintendo Entertainment System and Burai Fighter Deluxe on the Game Boy.
